label: 唐草
対訳語: Floral scrolls, arabesques, or scrolling vines.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: A vegetal pattern of plants and flowers with rhythmically curving vines. This pattern also found in ancient Egypt and Mesopotamia, came into Japan via the Silk Road.
